Public Remarks: Bear Creek Glen 2 bdrm in 55+ age restricted park, small pets ok. F/S, W/D, D/W, A/C unit and some furniture with wired workshop and huge covered patio all included. Public Remarks: Here is your quintessential cabin in the woods located in the quiet community of Tuwanek, steps to the beach (to explore Sechelt Inlet), a short drive to Tetrahedron Provincial Park and Dakota Ridge behind and just a 10 minute drive to d/t Sechelt! This fisherman's cabin was built by the high school's woodworking students as a class project for their shop teacher in 1982, to provide years of weekend enjoyment in his pursuit of the inlet's seafood bounties. Now, with a newly installed driveway, culvert, SCRD water, septic system and BC Hydro power pole & service - this property is ready to build a new residence or just use the existing cottage. There is a full hook-up for RV (incld 30 amp plug) to live in while you build!

Public Remarks: Top floor spacious 1 bedroom condo facing Blue Mountain Park! Tile floors thruout, freshly painted, maintenance includes heat + hot water plus pets + rentals allowed! Super central location - steps to shopping and minutes to skytrain + Lougheed Mall!

Hillcrest at Fraserview. Spacious, bright 1 bedroom unit in 55+ building. This ground floor unit boasts a huge private patio,and extra large bedroom with lots of storage. Building amenities include indoor swimming pool, games room, workshop party room and exercise room as wel as many planned activities for the residents. Close to the West Coast Express, bus and shopping. Very well-managed building.

Garrison Landing A community in a community. This extremely popular subdivisions borders on the North West (Finch) walking trail, the creek and the edge of the city. Phase 1 sold out in 8 hours and phase II is sure to sell out quick. Garr ison Landing is quickly becoming one of the most popular new subdivisions in Fort St. John for many reasons including a large park, walking trails access, variation of lot sizes including, pie shape, cul-de-sac and lots backing directly onto the walking trail. Lot of choices in home, builders and finishing touches.

Hobby farm is all ready for your animals. Sunny South location just a short drive from town makes a perfect spot for your new home. 2.58 acres fenced & crossed fenced with barn, paddocks, tack storage, 2x shop plus 2x carport. Homey feel to this 3bdrm 1 bath rancher that's cozy and oh so country. Newer high efficiency furnace and upgraded windows help keep the energy costs low. Property was once used as therapeutic riding arena, so it has all you need to house your horses. Saddle up and head south to this all round great farm.

Centrally located retirement community that is close to bus route, shopping & 2 different malls & numerous restaurants. You couldn't find a better located community. This 2 bedroom, 2 bath is located in the quiet corner of the park away fro m the road, has a single garage. Very inexpensive living as taxes are included in your monthly fees which are only $240.00 a month includes water, sewer, garbage pick-up. 55+ age restriction. 1 small pet allowed.

Mobile home with full length addition on 5 acres minutes from town. 1,690 square feet home with 3 bedrooms, large recreation room, and sundeck. Private property near the end of Balsam Road with a beautiful view of Hudson Bay Mountain. A 30 x 32 foot shop with a single carport off of one side and wood storage off the other side. There is also a 36 x 20 unfinished shop with RV storage and various other outbuildings on the property. Water is supplied by a shallow 10ft well that is spring fed.

Enjoy all of the beautiful sunsets from Fort St. John's newest subdivision Sunset Ridge. These single family lots are located across from other large homes and close to Finch Elementary School & public transit. This subdivision's future p lans include paved biking & hiking trails throughout the subdivision and connected up with others in the area, as well as it will have family trails to the man made lake/park area. Other plans include a neighbourhood commercial retail shopping area at the far Westside of 105 Ave and along 116 Street. This development is by Peace Holdings Inc. & Kevin Pearson is a shareholder/owner & Licensed Realtor

Spectacular panoramic views of Ocean and Mountains from both the main and upper floors. With over 4,800 square feet of living space, you can buy now and move in while you design your dream home. The current home is traditional throughout, with formal cross-hall living & dining room; spacious kitchen with eating area, and adjacent family room. Also on this floor is a grand study/den with fireplace and wet-bar overlooking the fantastic pool and entertaining area. 5 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms on upper level and a huge recreation room and storage area in the basement complete the home.
Realtor Remarks: SOLD Irregular lot. 130' front, 139.5 back, 150.62 West side, approx 100' East side. Lot size is approximate.

Public Remarks: Shaughnessy Treasure! Designed by Formwerks Architectural Inc, this substantially renovated 7100 sqft magnificent home offers distinctive quality and taste, elegant living areas and is located on a corner lot. Entertainment sized living & dining rooms have crown moulding, oak floors and iron wood panel. High end European style gourmet kitchen with trendy cabinets and quartz counter top. 6 bdrms including an extra-large master with spa-like ensuite, sitting area, walk in closet and an office. Open den with Tiffany glass. Recreation room, temperature-control wine cellar, gym & a huge sundeck with fire pit and outdoor kitchen are for your private party. Air conditioning, circular driveway, security gate & more. Absolutely A Beauty!
Realtor Remarks: The house actually has 4 levels. Measurement by Measure Masters. Buyer to verify if important. By Appointment Only. NOTE COMMISSION BONUS.

Public Remarks: Callisto penthouse residence sits 35 stories above the Coal Harbour waterfront & occupies the entire top floor of this award winning luxury dev boasting 360 panoramic views of the city & water. Completely re-designed by one of Vancouver's most renowned interior designers, this ultra-luxury residence offers over 5200 sq.ft. of dramatic living on one spacious level featuring floor to ceiling windows, limestone flrs & extensive custom millwork. Features: sensational master suite & 3 full guest bdrms. State of the art integrated lighting, security & a sophisticated media & sound system throughout. 24 hour security & concierge. Show like new.
